DOC.brief_summary: Exercise link cognitive health , old adult exercise recommend level . Cybercycling may provide additional cognitive benefit due increase motivation ride interactive 3D tour . Participants randomly assign three month either cybercycling traditional stationary biking ; complete comprehensive evaluation exercise . Older adult expect show significant neuropsychological , physiological behavioral gain .
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study test follow hypothesis : ( 1 ) stationary cycle virtual reality tour ( `` cybercyle '' ) enhance executive function clinical status traditional exercise ; ( 2 ) exercise effort explain improvement ; ( 3 ) brain-derived neurotrophic growth factor ( BDNF ) increase .
DOC.criteria: age 50+ able participate cycling physician permission unstable heart condition physician denial neurological condition
